title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7433.5 - Academy training records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7433.5 - Academy training records

State Regulations

Consistent with the requirements of this Part, OCFS shall
maintain current and accurate academy training records. These training records
shall include, but not be limited to: (a) names of trainees; (b) names of each training module; (c) time and date of each training
module; (d) names and records of
certification of each instructor; and
(e) exam results. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7433.5

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
